mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOMPANY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.ACCOMPANY_NO AS ACCOMPANY_NO, M.USER_NAME, C.COURSE_NO AS COURSE_NO, A.ACCOMPANY_DATE, A.WITH_TITLE, A.WITH_CONTENT, TO_CHAR (A.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS CREATE_DATE, A.COUNT, A.STATUS AS STATUS, A.ACCOMPANY_PEOPLE, COUNT(B.USER_NO) AS ACCOMPANY_NUM FROM ACCOMPANY A JOIN COURSE C ON (A.COURSE_NO = C.COURSE_INDEX) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ACCOMPANY_BRIDGE B ON (A.ACCOMPANY_NO = B.ACCOMPANY_NO) WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY A.ACCOMPANY_NO, M.USER_NAME, C.COURSE_NO, A.ACCOMPANY_DATE, A.WITH_TITLE, A.WITH_CONTENT, A.CREATE_DATE, A.COUNT, A.STATUS, A.ACCOMPANY_PEOPLE ORDER BY A.ACCOMPANY_NO DESC
